channel.title: I need some suggestions
channel.description:
For those that don't know(everyone except Ron/Freenode #delphi), I'm working on a RS2 client in Delphi. So far it's just a fast world switcher, but I got a few features I'm going to add:
Stat lookup, maps, treasure trail stuff, mini IRC client, multiple user profiles, easy-to-use skins. I was wondering if anyone could suggest any other features? Thanks.

item.title: I need some suggestions
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Winter Ice:

kk and what happend to kulma.ath.cx that was cool btw your on a locking spree arnt you lol

I lock topics that need to be asked in a PM, or one wrong forums. I’m not sure about kulma.ath.cx, it rings bells but I can’t remember it.

Read full topic

item.title: I need some suggestions
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Winter Ice:

ummm item/npc/object database lookup thing

I’ll add it to the list.

If anyone’s wondering, I’ll be using runehq and tip.it for a lot of the mainly rs type stuff.

Read full topic
